name: Adventurecat and the Lovely Town
description:
Begin by walking into "town" icon.  Use arrow keys or WASD to walk.

Made with Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Ledoux and Image to Bitsy by ruin.

This is an extension of the main street storefronts from Adventurecat and the Lost Temple, my first Adventurecat game. In this experience, you can walk around and explore the town of Petsonia, where TC (Adventurecat) lives. There's lots of little bits of silliness sprinkled throughout. I had a blast making it.

If you're more into puzzles, check out The Lost Temple or Pixel Manor.

The first scene includes a kawaii portrait of TC, converted to Bitsy. Here's the original, drawn in Procreate.
